title: 447 26 "Jet Pistol of Anger! Luffy vs. Blackbeard!"Transliteration: "Ikari no Jetto Pisutoru – Rufi vs Kurohige" (Japanese:怒りのJETピストル　ルフィvs黒ヒゲ) Makoto Sonoda Yoshiyuki Suga April 18, 2010(2010-04-18)[32]
transformers_text: 447 26 Jet Pistol of Anger Luffy vs Blackbeard Transliteration Ikari no Jet to P is u toru Ru fi vs Kuro hig e Japanese JET vs Makoto Sonoda Yoshiyuki Suga April 18 2010 2010 04 18 32 After Luffy punches Blackbeard Blackbeard retaliates by slamming him into the ground injuring him by nullifying his rubber powers Jim bei convinces Luffy that he cannot afford to waste time fighting Blackbeard when he needs to hurry and save Ace Crocodile questions why Blackbeard would attack the prison when doing so would mean giving up his Warlord title but Blackbeard reveals that it is part of a larger plan As Magellan approaches the prisoners Luffy easily defeats the revived Minotaur us while Ivan kov defeats Sadie and ties her up with her whip Buggy and Mr 3 reach Level 1 with the prisoners following them Magellan poisons Blackbeard and his crew before proceeding on to stop Luffy from escaping
tf_idf_text: jet pistol anger luffy blackbeard transliteration ikari jet toru kuro hig japanese jet makoto sonoda yoshiyuki suga april luffy punch blackbeard blackbeard retaliates slam ground injure nullify rubber power jim bei convinces luffy cannot afford waste time fight blackbeard need hurry save ace crocodile question blackbeard would attack prison would mean give warlord title blackbeard reveals part large plan magellan approach prisoner luffy easily defeat revive minotaur ivan kov defeat sadie tie whip buggy reach level prisoner follow magellan poison blackbeard crew proceed stop luffy escape
